name: Sanity or Sunrise
description:
"As night falls, you feel the old hunger gnawing at you, clawing away your grip on reality. 

It must be satisfied.

In the name of change you must feast on the vulnerable, foolish and desperate. They are cautious, but with each delicious tasting, your final transition looms closer..."

Survive the night in this first person stealth survival game and avoid the encroaching madness by engorging yourself on those who dare wander the streets. Seek to transition to a state of ultimate vampirism; a blood soaked god who can transcend the creeping itch of the endless thirst.

Controls:

Mouse: look around

WASD: movement

F: Attack

E: Interact

Shift: Run

TEAM HEX

Programming: ZenithSal

VFX/Sprites/Level Design: Gravebud

Music/Sound Design: Tom Jensen

Collectively designed by all

Additional Foley / Voice Acting: Sonia Mobassem
